text: KPRV (1280 AM) is a radio station broadcasting an adult standards music format. Licensed to Poteau, Oklahoma, United States, it serves the Ft. Smith, Arkansas, area. The station is currently owned by Leroy and JoAnn Billy. ==History== Originally established in 1953 as KLCO, KPRV is a family-owned and operated radio station which features Adult Standards ("America's Best Music") 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Owners LeRoy and JoAnn Billy provide local communities with current weather and news. The station also provides coverage of local sporting events ==External links== * KPRV official website PRV Category:Classic country radio stations in the United States
